sentences.en: A tersely phrased statement of a truth or opinion an adage.
sentences.cn: 格言,警句蕴含真理或看法的精练的语句;警句.

sentences.en: Answering probably an adage: The day fails the person wishes.
sentences.cn: 或许正应了一句老话: 天不遂人愿.

sentences.en: At the time the adage emerged, apples were easy to grow ( and still are ).
sentences.cn: 在谚语中出现之时, 是因为苹果容易栽培 ( 一直如此 ).

sentences.en: But the old adage that men grow into office has not proved true in my experience.
sentences.cn: 但是,根据我的经验,人们所谓的工作岗位造就人材这句古话并不正确.

sentences.en: Han Jia , I think both of us have followed this adage.
sentences.cn: 韩佳, 我觉得我们俩就是这么做的.

sentences.en: Her experience lends credence to the adage " We live and learn! "
sentences.cn: 她的经验印证了一句格言: 活到老,学到老!

sentences.en: I refer him to the adage " a rolling stone gathers no mass. "
sentences.cn: 我以 “ 滚石不生苔 ” 这格言规劝他.

sentences.en: REMEMBER the BOXING ADAGE: LEAD WITH SPEED , FOLLOW with POWER!
sentences.cn: 记住那句拳击格言: 快拳开路, 重拳跟上!

sentences.en: Remember the old adage — buy cheap, buy twice!
sentences.cn: 记住那句俗语:便宜无好货.

sentences.en: The adage " Trade is better than aid " is clearly of great relevance to agriculture.
sentences.cn: “ 贸易胜于援助, ” 这一格言对于农业显然是十分中肯的.

sentences.en: the old adage that a picture is worth a thousand words
There is a homely adage which runs ,'speak softly and carry a big stick; "
sentences.cn: 有句众所周知的格言 “ 说话温和而手持大棒, 你才能走得远 ”.

sentences.en: There is much truth in the old adage about fools and their money.
sentences.cn: 在这本关于愚人及其钱财的古老谚语中,蕴藏着很多真理.

sentences.en: There is the old adage , " In the Spring and Autumn Era there were no righteous wars. "
sentences.cn: 古人说: “ 春秋无义战. ”

sentences.en: What's the adage rife in man's mouth?
sentences.cn: 脍炙人口的格言是 什么 ?

sentences.en: You've heard the adage many times about turning lemons into lemonade, right ?
sentences.cn: 相信你已经听过这个谚语很多次了吧,是关于把柠檬变成柠檬汽水的, 是 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a well-known phrase that says something wise about human experience
